Time for sending some newsletters!

This is just a sample mockup newsletter template, for any email marketing purposes. MailChimp offers a default free account which is capable of sending many free emails daily. Clearly this approach can certainly be used for TeamUp, Ask and/or AskFast corporate websites as well.
